docs.lead_paragraph: The 144-page bill is almost underwhelming in its size and scope. But after five years of political gridlock, that may be the inherent genius of it.

headline.main: A Budget Deal Promising Peace Is Rooted in Modest Goals
headline.print_headline: A Budget Deal Promising Peace Is Rooted in Modest Goals

docs.abstract: Budget deal finally agreed to by Congress is framed with modest goals; combines small spending increases and program cuts, compromise that was needed to secure enough votes for passage.
docs.snippet: The 144-page bill is almost underwhelming in its size and scope. But after five years of political gridlock, that may be the inherent genius of it.

docs.lead_paragraph: Nevada officials on Tuesday ordered the closure of a cryotherapy center just outside Las Vegas where police say a worker was found dead last week in a chamber that exposes a person's body to extremely cold air.

docs.lead_paragraph: A Las Vegas spa where an employee was found frozen and dead inside a liquid nitrogen chamber used for cryotherapy treatments wasn't licensed by the city, county or state to perform cosmetic or other procedures, authorities said Tuesday.

headline.main: Authorities: Vegas Cryotherapy Spa Had No License

docs.lead_paragraph: Drugstore chain Walgreens Boots Alliance Inc said on Tuesday it would acquire smaller peer Rite Aid Corp for $9.4 billion to widen its footprint in the United States and negotiate for lower drug costs.

headline.main: Walgreens Says Will Buy Smaller Drugstore Rival Rite-Aid
headline.print_headline: Walgreens Says Will Buy Smaller Drugstore Rival Rite-Aid

headline.main: Jeb Bush Calls for Curtailing Costs of Social Security and Medicare

docs.abstract: “We need to recognize that Americans are living longer, healthier lives, and we should make it easier for those who choose to work longer,” Jeb Bush wrote in a set of proposals involving the future of Medicare and Social Security.
docs.snippet: “We need to recognize that Americans are living longer, healthier lives, and we should make it easier for those who choose to work longer,” Jeb Bush wrote in a set of proposals involving the future of Medicare and Social Security.

docs.lead_paragraph: Republican presidential candidate Jeb Bush on Tuesday proposed reforms to Medicare and Social Security that use the private sector to help pay for older Americans' health and living expenses after retirement and cut benefits to the wealthy.

headline.main: Bush on Medicare, Social Security: Add Private Plans, Cut Benefits to Wealthy
headline.print_headline: Bush on Medicare, Social Security: Add Private Plans, Cut Benefits to Wealthy

docs.lead_paragraph: The Philippines is unable to permanently resettle refugees from Australian-run detention camps as it attempts to provide for its own people, President Benigno Aquino III said Tuesday.

headline.main: Philippines Says It Can't Permanently House Aussie Refugees
headline.print_headline: Philippines Says It Can't Permanently House Aussie Refugees

docs.snippet: The Philippines is unable to permanently resettle refugees from Australian-run detention camps as it attempts to provide for its own people, President Benigno Aquino III said Tuesday.

headline.main: Talking Early About How Life Should End

docs.abstract: When aging people discuss with their families how they wish to die, all are spared extra grief when the end comes.
